Camera & Lighting

I have worked in a variety of on-set positions, generally in the camera department. On lower-budget projects, I also tend to colour-grade my own work.

2035

Director of Photography / Colourist   

'2035' is a project on which I was director of photography, with a small team of about five people under my responsibility, and colourist. Despite a very small budget, the project involved some interesting and challenging set-pieces, such as a night exterior riot scene with 20+ extras. The visual language of the film was developed early on in production, with an overall emphasis on desaturated blue/green tones.

Trailer

Colour Grading

Visual Effects

Near the end of post-production, I was also tasked with working on a few VFX shots which would help strengthen the world-building of the short film.
